CADI.Common.LogicalTarget.JPEG2000.Parameters

Class COCParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • CADI.Common.LogicalTarget.JPEG2000.Parameters.COCParameters

  • public class COCParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    This class storages the coding style default (COC). Further and detailed information, see ISO/IEC 15444-1 section A.6.2.
    Version:
    1.0 2010/11/19
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int blockHeight
      Block height (exponent of 2) for each image component.
      int blockWidth
      Block width (exponent of 2) for each image component.
      boolean bypass
      Style of code-block coding passes.
      boolean causal 
      boolean erterm 
      int[] precinctHeights
      Same as resolutionPrecinctWidths but for precinct heights.
      int[] precinctWidths
      Precinct width in the transformed domain resolution level.
      boolean reset 
      boolean restart 
      boolean segmark 
      int WTLevels
      DWT levels applied.
      int WTType
      Discrete wavelet transform applied.

    • Field Detail

      • WTLevels

        public int WTLevels
        DWT levels applied.

        Negative values not allowed.

      • WTType

        public int WTType
        Discrete wavelet transform applied.

        Valid values are:

        • 0 - Nothing
        • 1 - Reversible 5/3 DWT
        • 2 - Irreversible 9/7 DWT

      • bypass

        public boolean bypass
        Style of code-block coding passes. Further information, see ISO/IEC 15444-1 section A.6.1 (table A-19).

      • reset

        public boolean reset

      • restart

        public boolean restart

      • causal

        public boolean causal

      • erterm

        public boolean erterm

      • segmark

        public boolean segmark

      • blockHeight

        public int blockHeight
        Block height (exponent of 2) for each image component.

        Values greater than 2.

      • blockWidth

        public int blockWidth
        Block width (exponent of 2) for each image component.

        Values greater than 2.

      • precinctWidths

        public int[] precinctWidths
        Precinct width in the transformed domain resolution level. Note: rLevel==0 is the LL subband, and 1, 2, ... represents next starting with the little one.

        Values equal or greater than BlockWidth.

      • precinctHeights

        public int[] precinctHeights
        Same as resolutionPrecinctWidths but for precinct heights.

        Values equal or greater than blockHeight.

      • list

        public void list(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Prints this COC parameters' fields to the specified output stream. This method is useful for debugging.
        Parameters:
